highlights: 玩耍抓爪 - 猫除了睡觉还有什么功效? 当然,它是通过他们的爪子来玩耍! 猫抓板总是给猫咪带来伴侣般的吸引力。 他们喜欢和这款猫咪抓挠产品一起玩耍。
与猫一起睡觉 - 猫最常做什么? 答案始终是睡觉。 我们的 Catry 猫公寓是您的可爱小猫睡觉的猫屋。 设计精良的猫咪吊床牢牢地支撑猫咪,就像手一样。 猫塔为猫咪提供了从更高视角中放松的必要选择。
少就是多了 - Catry Design 一直致力于让产品更好、更轻松。 Catry 产品包含所有工具和说明书,致力于各种设计目的,使猫树产品结构更坚固,更容易安装和清洁。 通过提倡极简主义的理念,我们成功地将这种简单而酷炫的猫树产品带给所有宠物主人。 它不会因为搭配您的家居风格而失望。 答案很简单。 它匹配。
猫树尺寸事项——猫树旨在设计这种大小的猫塔。 除了窗户之外，智能猫咪会快速将猫树从宠物吊床一侧带到塔顶。 是的,它可以用作猫梯子,感受窗冰凉。 整体尺寸 40.64 cm 乘以 L 码,35.56 cm 乘以 H
优质控制 – Catry 在宠物用品行业拥有 20 多年的制造经验,一直在挑战中突破优质产品的任何限制。 100% 保证退货,您的满意就是我们的承诺。

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AF5TFUMMBT5G6QFN2QAS3N4PFQ6Q
reviews.review:
\n I rarely ever leave a review but this cat tree definitely blew away my expectations. I have 2 kitties both 3 years old the tabby is 12 lbs and the orange and white is 16lbs.

I bought this to replace a tattered old tree whose scratching post had destroyed. I was specifically looking for something sleek/modern looking with a "high" bed and a scratching post. Based on the reviews I figured my orange cat would be unable to use the tree given his size but figured he\'d enjoy the scratching post and I could use the bottom box to store their toys. Well much to my surprise both of my kitties are all over this tree. I\'ve only had it assembled for 24 hours and have already captured so many cute photos of both of them using it. I did spray it with their cat nip spray so they knew this was theirs. I\'m very happy with my purchase.

I definitely think I\'ll be buying a second one. I\'m very impressed with this cat tree.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AEBNDGRWTY2A6RDNILJALQWDOHRQ
reviews.review:
\n The tree is smaller than it looks, but it\'s my fault for not paying attention to the mention of it being a 30" tree. It also weighs very little, which means that my 7 lb. siamese cat can easily pull it over when she\'s trying to use the sisal post. The soft areas attach to the smooth surfaces with quarter-sized velcro stickers, and while they do hold decently well, I don\'t see them holding long term. I wouldn\'t recommend this tree for anything but a kitten. Even then, it\'s too expensive for what you get.

Update - The tree is now selling for less than 70% of what I paid, so I\'d consider it a good deal for a kitten. Other than that, look for something bigger.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AFYDOUQWQYVMZRPQG36CH5KBT2MA
reviews.review_title: Pleasantly surprised. Kitty doesn’t hate it!
reviews.review: \n  My cat loves sitting on the perch and looking out the window. She even uses the scratching post. I’ve never had a cat actually use a post that l\'ve bought, so it’s very nice. So glad that she likes it. It was very easy to put together, is space saving, and isn’t ugly like many cat trees are. It flows nicely with a room. Love that it has washable pads so it won’t become stinky or flea infested. Very pleased, l would definitely recommend it. Not for large cats though. Best for petite cats and kittens. :)\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AHW5F5C2RLHVCWJP56WTYEWRS43Q
reviews.review: \n  This is just about perfect for our needs. My cat is a large bodied cat and is a little chunky (fluctuates between 14 and 16 lbs). This tower fits him well. He curls up well both inside the box and up top on the bed. He\'s a curling up sort of cat, not a sprawling out cat. If he were a sprawling cat, this might be a bit small for him (though he does like draping himself over the edge of the top portion). The height is perfect for seeing out of our windows too (not obnoxiously tall, just medium height and simple). As far as quality goes, I\'m happy with this cat condo too. I wanted something that wasn\'t covered in bad carpet and that looked nice in the house. The laminated wood looks pretty nice on this, and it\'s sturdy and was easy to put together. I also like that all of the pads/beds are velcro, so you can take them off to wash them.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AHNHYFUIPEQJQG6O2JJY3YN3URNQ
reviews.review:
\n My grown cats turned it over the first time they hopped up on it. It may work well for kittens. It’s very unstable. The pads do not stay stuck with Velcro pads provided. We could not figure a way to make the top most pad stay fastened at all. We bought this for a specific spot. I am going to try using some old tree parts and adding a plywood top above the box. Then We will see elastic straps to some old cat beds we have already. If it works I will review again with pictures. I am going to recycle some bolts from old cat trees as well. If we end up using this, it will barely resemble what it started out as. If you are buying this tree for full grown cats, don’t. It might be good for kittens. But leave the top shelf completely off. It is dangerous. I will put a couple of 5 pound dumbbells in the base to stabilize.

I modified it using old cat tree parts. I stabilized the base so it doesn’t fall over when a cat jumps off. I added a larger platform to the middle as well as an old cat bed that has elastic in the 4 corners so it doesn’t slide off. I used a top platform from an old cat tree that has side for the top platform. The cat tree is stable and each perch will hold a full sized cat now. My oldest cat expresses her opinion of both the tree as well a my modifications there in the picture. I am keeping it remind myself to consider any cat purchase at least 16 times before I buy.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AE33JQ3IARCCHOVKHAF2ETTPGZ7A
reviews.review_title: My picky cat LOVES this tree!
reviews.review:
\n My cat doesn’t enjoy anything “made” for cats. She ignores beds and toys and opts for pillows and hair ties. However, she immediately fell in love with this tree! I introduced it to her and she quickly took a liking to the top tier especially. Super easy to assemble, some of the pieces made me nervous because they seemed lightweight but it doesn’t wobble when she jumps up there so I trust it. The only thing I’ll say is that the circumference of the top tier could be too small for larger cats. My cat is on the small size and she fills out pretty much the whole bed.

But all in all it was worth the money! My cat couldn’t be happier, this is the best purchase I’ve made for her!\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AGBRHKO6LGWIE3EUHLI66VGBYLJA
reviews.review_title: Thanks, I hate it (but my cat loves it).
reviews.review:
\n I hate this bed, but my cat loves it. If he\'s being too quiet and I don\'t know where he is...he\'s in the bed. If I haven\'t seen him in 3 hours .. he\'s in the bed. If I\'m lying in bed expecting to kick him on accident because I moved too quickly and he\'s been my bed buddy since day one, surprise! He\'s not there because he\'s in HIS bed!

I read some reviews similar to mine, but I foolishly though Not MY Cat! But unfortunately yes, my cat too has fallen prey to the witchcraft of this cat tree.

Good cat tree. Might need some extra velcro though, but my cat seems to love slipping around so what do I know?\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AFIXGBQV6K5LPQY3VGZBHWXEOYAQ
reviews.review:
\n The cat in the picture is for sure a small cat. My cat isn\'t overweight or anything. I mean yeah maybe he could lose an ounce or two, but so could anyone. He fits inside the house part but he definitely couldn\'t groom himself on the top part - and no, not because he\'s too fat to groom himself.
Also, the scratching post does not seem that tall.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AFRYW4QROT65TOJRJSYWF745Y7EQ
reviews.review: \n  So the parts for this are good quality, the wood is solid and all the screw were provided. The mats are a little smaller then they look in the product image. The base of the tower, part “A” is missing its feet so it sits directly on the floor which is bad. The velcro to attach the pads to the tower don’t work and there are only enough for one of the pads and the bed on top. I have a pretty small cat and she was able to move the pads around a lot with just the Velcro attaching them to the wood. I ended up having to glue them down which was disappointing.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AG7JLUK4CRRQMFOXTRFY43J4QJBA
reviews.review_title: Love, but especially great for small cats or kittens!
reviews.review: \n  I have two kittens and one adult cat (15lb). They all love the cubby part at the bottom, but the top is really only big enough for the kittens (5lbs). I really like the modern design and complete lack of carpet :) The adult cat can fit all the way in the cubby at the bottom, he\'s just partially out in the photo because he wanted to pose for me ;) It\'s not easy to tip over, but if the cats jump from the top it does wobble a little due to lack of heavy weight at the bottom. The unit itself is sturdy. I\'d recommend, especially for smaller cats.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AE6MTAGAR5AP4755TLGD22TMWPHA
reviews.review: \n  Although our cat loves to sit on the top away from our pup the bed that comes with it is much smaller than the one shown. Not even coming close to the sharp corners. The Velcro to keep it on top is not great either. I had to buy a different bed to put ontop and protect the edges. The platform below is not quite big enough for the cat to use to lay on, or even use as a step to get to the top platform. It certainly looks great and perhaps would be better for smaller cats around 9lbs. Or if there is something else they can use to access the top platform. We use the bottom cuddle area to hold toys because it’s a bit small for our cat and went unused.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AHLPSKCD5GRTHJL5ON5FMG7SVFJQ
reviews.review: \n  Super easy to put together. It’s just a bit small. I have an adult female cat. They give you Velcro stickers to put underneath the bed, but they don’t do anything. The bed slid right off. I had to get heavy duty double sided tape. The cubby is too small, she hates it. I love how modern it looks though. I wish they would provide more options for the bed colors. Tan does not do well with black cats. Overall, it’s sturdy and looks nice. She loves sitting at the top.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AEL45DCMJZFYVINYBSLGNLSDG2UA
reviews.review: \n  Unlike carpeted cat houses, this one is a wood-like material that I think looks more like a piece of furniture. It was easy to assemble, and my cat loves sitting on the perch and looking out the window. You can detach the bed and top piece for cleaning - a bonus!  Sturdy, and not too big, this is the perfect compromise for a smaller area.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AG6FD6BWQ5443MQ4QC3KDR4SEKTQ
reviews.review_title: Peefect for Kittens Not so Much for Big Cats
reviews.review:
\n This cat tree condo is the perfect size for our little kitten Harlym. She\'s really petite like her mom and fits in the perch platform like it was custom built for her.

The pillows are really soft and very warm. She does not know what to do with the scratch post even after we tried to teach her so it\'s just there for now. I also got her a scratch wave and she\'s not interested in scratching that either.

Putting the cat tree condo together was a breeze. It took about 10 mins going real slow and reading all instructions. It probably could be done even without instructions. One panel had very minor imperfections in the laminate which is not really an issue as that side was flipped toward the interior of the condo so it\'s not visible except maybe to the kitten. The only panel that cannot be flipped around is the top one with the Catry gold color metal logo.

All in all, very happy with this purchase.

Catry Wooden Cat Tree Condo with Natural Sisal Rope Scratching Post for Kitten\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AECUZRYIJUI6JGPRV3GEPSMUSRBA
reviews.review: \n  Kitty approved! Opened up the box and as soon as I laid the bedding on the floor one of my cats was snuggled on it. I am worried about the sturdiness as it seems to wobble a lot and my other cat is a 20lb kitty. Probably will try to add some weight some how and will be moved to a corner spot in room. Which is highly recommend for any cat tree.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AEX5MX2LVYNE266PQL73DVKNQPFQ
reviews.review:
\n Noooo. I was into this tower. But not anymore. So bummed.

The second time I washed the bed, it literally shredded apart. Howww? It’s very difficult to clean. The fur and dirt just collect into lint bundles on the surface. I cannot believe it tore open like this upon second wash.

It’s impossible to contact company for new bed. If you’re out there, can you rectify this damage?\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AFICEGN4VH7XAG5ZRPMTPBLAPVJA
reviews.review_title: My Cat Loves This - Highly Recommend for a Small Cat Condo
reviews.review: \n  I’ve had this long enough to say it’s a complete success.  I wanted this for my kitty who likes to look out the window and it’s the perfect height. It also has a small footprint so isn’t in the way, plus it looks much nicer than most I’ve seen.  All of the pads are removable so they can easily be washed.  They have Velcro bits to keep them in place and haven’t budged even when my cat has made a flying leap onto it.  He’s in the top bed all the time, not much use for the other levels but does sometimes use the scratching post.  Again, this isn’t that big so may not be great if you have a couple large cats – mine is around 12 lbs and it’s a perfect size for him.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AFVBNGHVUIHXSSNLSPCRGR7ECHAQ
reviews.colour_product: 样式名称: 第 2 代
reviews.review: \n   I love the quality of this cat tree and it was very easy to assemble...except that there were NO instructions included.  Minor inconvenience but I am very pleased with this cat tree.  It\'s perfect for my home office where my cat likes to hang out while I work.  Only other issue is that I feel it could be slightly taller but that would speak more to my particular application.  I placed it near a window and my cat took to it right away.  Highly recommend, as long as you\'re crafty or willing to seek out some helpful instructions.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AECEJYVHKHIVNMWYSM4FJAQCU35A
reviews.review: \n  This is a very well-made and very stylish cat tree. However, my cat doesn\'t fit on it, anywhere. He\'s a very average-sized 5-year-old domestic shorthair. He curls up in the bottom cube for about 10 mins at a time but has to get out to move or adjust at all. It is VERY, very small, best for kittens. He jumped on the top part one time, which tipped it over due to how small it is.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AECHICD6RNUBR4WZCRBUAVHMRKYQ
reviews.review: \n   I spent over an hour lint rolling and using tweezers picking these black hairs off of the cushion and little white mats. Random white paint splatter than won’t come off (see video and photos).  All the pieces came with scratched paint all over, NOT REAL WOOD, poorly painted fake wood with scratches all in the paint. Dingy scratched up metal logo that does not come off, not sure if this was a returned item that was sold as “NEW” or their quality control department needs to STEP IT UP! NOT WORTH THE PRICE! DISPLEASED OVERALL.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AGEQFE5CE3N5FLY25IJ5XSHXMIOQ
reviews.review_title: Not stable enough, too small for 12 lb cat
reviews.review: \n  The whole top section is rickety. Also, it really is too small for a large cat, if nothing else because of unstable design. My cat is around 12-13 lbs and only maybe a tad overweight. He wouldn’t go near the thing.  It would be fine for a small cat probably under 10lbs. The directions were not clear where to put the washer - above or below the board that scratching post attaches too. Not sure it would matter tho regarding stability. The washer is too thick.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AGZWZWP2HJDGVJ4HBQ6BLTMTLKXA
reviews.review: \n  We purchased this to allow the little one access to the window without getting on the table (cats are so hard to train).  It sort of worked. It took the Old Man cat a little longer to investigate. Several weeks in, he checked out the cubby for a few minutes,  and he\'s too big for the top of the cubby. Once he found he could get to the top bed (again,  he is big and getting older), he lives on it. Little one knows its OMs now and won\'t go up there :-D She just sits below and bats at his tail.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AFM5MWI5AOJRX2YPBZGYWB7BR3ZQ
reviews.review_title: Not sturdy, my 8 pounds 10 months old kitty knocked it down
reviews.review: \n  Some part were chipped and the wood is not even wood but the worst part is it is not sturdy at all. My 8 pounds 10 months old kitty knocked it down. Bottom compartment is only comfortable for the kitty if you have any cats more than 10 pounds, they won’t fit there. It was easy to assemble and I put it together myself but I would send it back if I wasn’t too lazy to dissemble it. Not worth the money.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AFEUX75DUYTSID5KJTHW7VJAJCZQ
reviews.review: \n  This is such a sleek cat tower and a pretty sturdy one too, but unfortunately my two cats are too big for it. The one pictured (Onyx) is the only one who will use it. He\'ll only sleep in the bottom cubby and generally hangs halfway out of it in order to lay inside. If you have a small cat this is perfect for you! I\'m keeping this because Onyx honestly loves it, we\'ll just get another larger cat tower I guess. This is what we do for our cats.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AFQFUGKH3NDACHZX7V67SZBT5RGA
reviews.review:
\n This was surprisingly great quality. Normally, cat trees are ugly and wobble. Not so with this one! It looks exactly like the photos.

This one has a faux wood veneer that actually looks very convincing. It\'s super sturdy. I assembled it in less than a half an hour, very simple.

It is compact in size, which is great if you don\'t want something huge in your living space. I have a 10 week old kitten and a 12 lb. adult cat. The box and top perch are large enough for my cat. The middle perch is the right size for my kitten. My kitten took to the scratching post right away.

I really appreciated the little details on this, like the Velcro stickies for the mats/bed and the 3M rubber tabs that ensure it doesn\'t scratch my floor.

The only things that could be improved is making the top perch a smidge larger and a few small aesthetic changes, but I would definitely buy it again.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AEJVWKIUOXSVON3IMMXLMGAGEUPA
reviews.review:
\n 1st of all, received a returned product, w/o instructions, just parts jammed into a box.

Despite the lack of packaging, the wood and fabric parts were in excellent condition. The hardware was in a zip lock bag. Not sure if it came with the 2 Allen wrenches needed for assembly since they weren\'t in the bag.

Assembly was straight forward, and the finished product is attractive and sturdy. It\'s a good size for small or medium sized cats.

Review score:
Returned item, no packaging, etc. 0 out of 5 stars
Assembled item, 5 stars\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AG3KVLGP2H5OU6OXAOMDAVD665WA
reviews.review: \n  Have always wanted something like this... Cat furniture that looks nice in the house and doesn\'t cost a fortune! I was worried when this first came that the top level and bed was going to be too small for my large 12 pound cats. But they enjoy it very much. It took just minutes to put together and I like that the covers are easily washable and they have velcro to keep them in place.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AHRVVYJ25CY26OVXS55PZPB7QNMA
reviews.review_title: Great tree needs to be packed better for shipping!
reviews.review: \n  I love this tree as it matches my floors and it’s not covered in ugly carpet like a lot of cat trees are! Our cat loves to sit on it and use it as a scratching post so she doesn’t go inside the hole that much. Basically comes in the box it’s packaged and when shipped so one of the corners of one of the pieces was chipped and I had to glue together in order to assemble so better packing would be a good suggestion to the company!\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AFW7E2R3LG7UAQQKLIYHD7YLSYQA
reviews.review_title: Allergen friendly, just the right size for my needs, cat loves it.
reviews.review: \n  My kitty condo arrived in perfect condition, was easy to put together, and my cat Dahlia loves it. Yes, it isn’t huge- but that was a selling point for me. It’s thick “wood” and feels very sturdy. I like that you put Velcro dots to keep pads in place, then if needed you can take the pads and wash them and dust the thing. (Unlike carpet ones which are allergy nightmares.) I needed mine to be level with the window (it is at 30”) and should I need it taller I could always add legs easily with a drill later. I love it! Five stars.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AGVIJQNXMDX7QUTZGMGTCEATY7BA
reviews.review:
\n Frankie likes it so how can I argue?
It was very easy to assemble and feels sturdy.
Not too expensive. Not hideous. Just as advertised. I appreciate that it came with some little sticky things with Velcro on one side to hold the mats in place. A nice detail so Frankie doesn’t fly off the other side when he jumps on. I am getting some 6 inch hairpin legs to add to the bottom to lift the whole thing a little higher.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AGVI45BMSXDCRBON6K6ED7YLHOTQ
reviews.review: \n  Overall good. The upper section however is attached by one thick screw to the pole and also at lower end of pole which will allow it to rotate if not tightened very hard. The pillow for the top is different from the others and has sort of a curve to it which made it not stick to wooden plate as uniformly as the other perfectly flat cushions. Regardless…my three little stooges love it.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AEOE6MY6WEUFWGFQSCPPL7NMFKGQ
reviews.review_title: Not great for bigger cats < 13 lbs
reviews.review:
\n My cat is 13 lbs.... This cat tree was way too small for her, so she really only used the middle platform. I tried to get her comfortable with the highest tier but she always comes down. Perhaps it feels too shaky for her? Also, she never goes into the little cubby hole either.... I figured that if she doesn\'t use most of it, it\'s not really a good fit. She does use the scratching post sometimes, but she prefers the cheap little cardboard lounger over that.

Overall, good for the price. Very esthetically pleasing. Just not the best for bigger cats who like to splay out when they\'re relaxing or looking out the window.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AGGIIB7AL3EFCAAV5RE6RN2RDSTQ
reviews.review: \n  The box on this is too shallow for the cat to fit inside comfortably. The material is of poor quality. Don\'t buy this. Spend a little more and get the Vesper cat tree, it\'s much higher quality and is heavier/sturdier and larger so that cats can actually fit inside of it comfortably. I regret buying this cat tree.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AHEMAN6QI2BQXLQVIJRQFMWDT7GA
reviews.review: \n  My cat loves this!  I assembled it in 10 minutes with nothing other than what came in the box.  I love that the pads are attached by Velcro so that I can take them off and wash them as needed.  The house is very sturdy, and my 10lb cat climbs it without it wobbling.  She is a large cat, and I was worried that she wouldn’t fit comfortably in the hole or top platform.  But within the first day I found her sleeping in each of those spots quite comfortably!  Finally, this cat condo looks great in our modern home.  I highly recommend it!\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AFMH2RG6K6TCB4OY366SU53K5NAQ
reviews.review_title: Great cat post for smaller cats
reviews.review: \n  Our cats are smaller, so they can fit inside the box or under the top post to use the scratching post. However, a larger cat might not appreciate this cat tower. I\'d give the product 5 stars, but deducted one for being smaller than advertised. It\'s a few inches shorter.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AFYSCSN6JBD64T5EDOVJ2TZRNPQQ
reviews.review:
\n This product is deceivingly too small. I have a regular 9lb Siamese cat and he was not able to lay down inside.

The top platform is also not very accommodating. I can only assume through deductive reasoning that the cat in the advertisement video was a young 6lb or cat.

Not worth the money. I would suggest going to Petco and personally choosing something larger.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AHHYTJGP6WQLVFYNOWNHTBFKYCLQ
reviews.colour_product: 样式名称: 第 2 代
reviews.review: \n  We’ve got an older kitty, who now resides in the little kitty television at the bottom of this tree all of the time and a younger kitty who looms over his domain at the tippy top. This is a great little kitty tree, easy to assemble and very sturdy! I like it a lot.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AFUSSZX4LDW675WG7O2WU6DGCU4Q
reviews.review: \n  I was so excited about this cat tree, i love the color and its so sturdy! As i was assembling it i noticed that the wooden part at the top was missing!!! So disappointed. Now we have to disassemble it, return it and buy a new one, which is quite a hassle amd a waste of my time.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AEPEXQGDK3IR5V5ESGLX27FV46EQ
reviews.colour_product: 样式名称: 第 2 代
reviews.review_title: Kitten cannot jump from the first to second shelf
reviews.review: \n  The construction of this tree is not easy for my kitty to access the second shelf. Kitty didnt use it at all. He couldn\'t jump to the second shelf therefore it doesnt serve the purpose as a cat tree. Material was decent and looked cute, but that\'s about it. They make the second shelf almost parallel the first shelf .... Where is the space to jump on, unless you put it next to a chair or another shelf but then what\'s the point? Waste of time and money.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AEKR7NSKBBFANU5IUWEW3XARE5MQ
reviews.review: \n  A genuinely nice-looking piece of cat furniture. The kittens use all parts of it--scratching post, cubbyhole, shelf,  and top perch (their favorite part--they curl up in it together). I love the wood look and the fact that all the upholstery can be removed and washed/replaced. I\'m never going back to manky old carpet-covered cat trees again. Cat furniture makers, please design more like this!\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AFY4SIVFZDOFTAEDAVSG3A7LBKNA
reviews.review: \n  This cat tree is great. It was very easy to assemble and looks very sleek and modern. The quality was actually better than expected. I was worried that my cat would not be interested but as you can see, he loves it. The only suggestion I would make is to provide options for a larger cat tree. My cat is on the chunky side and would probably be more comfortable with a slightly larger top deck but overall it works great.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AEE56ETI26LF3Z74KTCCADKSFYTQ
reviews.review_title: Good quality and looks like furniture
reviews.review: \n  Youngest got a cat for Christmas and realized cat needed something a little higher so he could look out windows without jumping all over furniture. It wobbles a little, bit I have it on carpet. He’s a little chunky cat but he loves laying in the top and using the scratch post. Best of all, it doesn’t look like a typical, “carpet” cat condo; it actually looks like it could be furniture. Super easy to assemble.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AHRFDDXCFB5WWFG3OLBS2LY3C3DA
reviews.review: \n  It’s sturdy and good-looking. My biggest cat is about 11lbs and fits on it just fine. My cats don’t use it as much as I wish, but that’s probably my fault for not putting it next to a window. I do catch one of them snoozing in the hut from tme to time (we put a little blanket in there to make it a bit more comfy.)\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AG2XLTPCMZDDSSCIJ6XFGUHXIWUA
reviews.review: \n  Consider this a shout from the rooftops on how much I (and my little dude) love this tree! It\'s a great window vantage point and comfortable enough for him to luxuriate for hours at a time. Curious if it\'s possible to buy/replace specific parts? There\'s a hole in the pad that sits on top of the scratch post platform that exposes the stuffing, so I can no longer wash it! Thanks in advance for any help/suggestions!\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AH23L7COKYCJW7PCKUMVVAN3Q7LA
reviews.review_title: Looks nice, good quality! Kitten size
reviews.review: \n  Definitely petite/kitten size. Our cat is a 11 pound tabby, full grown. She mostly fits on the top and seems content to sit there for a few hours but cannot stretch out to sleep like she does on her other cat tree. It’s also lightweight so she’ll scoot it some when she jumps off.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AHSBHXY6ZITX5AJZYLWO7RYV65XA
reviews.review: \n  This cat tree is great! I have a pretty large cat, he\'s 12ish pounds, and I was worried that this would be way too small for him but he loves it! Its very sturdy and the perfect height for him to look out of the window! He fits in the box on the bottom but he doesn\'t really use it, being in small spaces is not his thing. The beds that come with it are super soft and easy to wash in the washing machine.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AEQS2TMVKYYNFDJXYM7QMW2RTZVQ
reviews.review: \n  Good looking cat tree from the universe of unsightly trees. I bought some velcro pieces to help the top bed stay attached. My kitten was a bit wary at first because the bed would slide when he jumped since the velcro included isn\'t that strong. The edges are also a bit sharp so I wouldn\'t recommend for tiny babies or as a standalone cat tree. He uses another cat tree to jump on to this one and it works fine. He likes to nap there often (he has many choices). He doesn\'t get much use out of the sisal pole.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AGHLSYLGOTF73CGXTX7WIF57JKWQ
reviews.review:
\n She got into the box before it was even finished being assembled.

Looking for our cat?...you will find her on her perch either staring out the window or all curled up in the cozy cushion. She is a regular size adult cat. Cushion fits her perfectly. So glad we bought THIS one.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AEQUL4QTNTITTIXFC367S74KUFSQ
reviews.review: \n  We just adopted a 3 year old ragdoll cat and decided on this cat tower for her. Our ragdoll is on the smaller side weighing around 10 pounds. She seems to really like it so far. Still not very curious or confident to climb on the perch but I think she’ll get there. The design is aesthetically pleasing and it’s pretty sturdy.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AEFV6D5X4VZG33SEEN2FCHQOSTQQ
reviews.review: \n  My cats like this and I like the look of it. It’s quite small but I live in an apartment so thats what I was looking for. Not super sturdy but not terrible. Easy to assemble. All in all I like it a lot but I’ll probably have to get something much larger at some point to keep my cats busy!\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AEIC2PVPOLRRTDQ3HN46AFASQXZA
reviews.review: \n  My kitty loves and more importantly, so do I. It’s so chic and beautiful and also very easy to assemble. I contacted the seller because I was missing a screw and they are shipping it to me and helped me immediately. Highly recommend!\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AHCLCBFIVO2K4N37KN23VM3FUUFA
reviews.review: \n  My cat naps on this for most of the day.  She only uses the top part and the scratching post but that\'s all we need.  I also feel like its a huge improvement style wise from my last cat tree, it looks nice in the house which I couldn\'t say about the last one I had.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AGG7P2KZENP6PXNTFOD3AEM7FUJA
reviews.review: \n  Slightly cheap materials and I’m not a fan of how the pad at the top sits but cat enjoys laying on it more than her previous one. I like that the pieces are removable to wash. Definitely for a smaller cat.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AEDL6E4H6Y3UGJUFOEW6ASDXR62Q
reviews.review_title: Great cat tree for a small space
reviews.review: \n  i was looking for something that would fit in my small apartment and not be an eye sore. This is the perfect window seat for him and gives him a comfy spot to hide his toys and snooze. My cat is large - weighs about 14 lbs and fits perfectly on the platform and in the box.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AE5V6NW5EFVGGUBCXKOKL7UVLCBQ
reviews.review_title: Perfect small and modern cat tree
reviews.review: \n  My cats are now 1 yr and 3 months so they’re not quite kittens but not full grown and they seemed to fit fine. The entire tree is on the smaller side which is what I wanted for my room but cats like to get in smaller spaces so they took to it quickly. They love it and have started to play and sleep on it as I was assembling it. Very sleek and modern which I love and seems easy to clean/vacuum cat fur off of it. Definitely sturdy too.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AGKJYQBK67RKD3Q2C7OJO33VBO2A
reviews.review: \n  Looked very nice, unfortunately the base broke after only 3 months!  The tube is nothing but cardboard wrapped in sisal, and broke in half. Not enough to hold a cat. Very disappointing. And of course broke 1 month outside my return window and I can\'t get in touch with the manufacturer.  I would not recommend.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AERHWJJPJQ5WDR6MO3LH4QKXGMZA
reviews.review:
\n The first one I was sent was damaged but Amazon took care of it and sent me a replacement for free.
The replacement I was sent was absolutely perfect and we LOVE it! Sooooo worth the money. I love that it’s modern and clean looking and not too big for our house. Would for sure buy another.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AHTKIKUFA4MJXFZAJDQ27SV2JMZQ
reviews.review: \n  This cat tree is perfect. Not too big, not too expensive , very sturdy  мodern looking and good quality. Unfortunately, my kitten doesn\'t yet likes it but I am hoping he will line it in the future\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AGT62XKAMMVXGTGAMERNMNPCFGVQ
reviews.review_title: Love it but wish it is bigger!!!
reviews.review: \n  Cute. Super easy to assemble. Look modern & stylist. I wish it can be a bit bigger, more like 15 x 15 x 15 so my cat can fit better. Now he is kinda squeeze in. Both on top & bottom. My cat is 13 pounds & well behave. So far he seem to adjust well with it. Please make a bigger version !!!!\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AEBFSOQUHC7QVVEMDW3C3SXXMWOA
reviews.colour_product: 样式名称: 第 2 代
reviews.review: \n  I can\'t even assemble this since the holes in the pieces that are supposed to be screwed together do not line up. I don\'t have my own drill to make new ones and I shouldn\'t need any tools aside from the ones included and on the instructions. At this point it\'s a matter of choosing the hassle of getting additional tools to finish the job or the hassle of returning this\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AGZGFTWAUS73D7WKUU2ZYYOIACTA
reviews.colour_product: 样式名称: 第 2 代
reviews.review: \n  It looks like proper furniture and my cats, from seven to sixteen pounds, all use it in turn. I wish the padding was better attached, but that\'s a minor quibble.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AEGEQ46UGNYNQKVWZEXFCG3XZ5IA
reviews.colour_product: 样式名称: 第 2 代
reviews.review: \n  I just got a kitten (6 months) and was looking for a smaller “cat tree” to get him started with heights in my house. It’s the perfect perching spot for him at the window and the cushions are actually soft, durable and so easy to clean in the wash. Scratching post is great too and after a little over a month of use it’s still intact and doesn’t shed too much. Highly recommend!\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AETFP7DOY32GKISM4RBNGE6PQBJQ
reviews.review: \n  A bit cheaply made but my cat is getting a bit older and her tall one was too hard to reach. This is perfectly level with my window and she LOVES it! Especially cause it’s also level with my desk and she likes to watch me!\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AFTXT4AUPSCDGCKULHBR5OFCPRCA
reviews.review: \n  I have a very small apartment and wanted a cat tree that would fit with my modern aesthetic and not be obtrusive.  I LOVE this tree. It came in a small box (16 lbs) and was very easy to assemble alone.  I have two cats: 1 is 10lbs and the other is 8 lbs.  Only one of them can fit inside the box at a time, which is no issue. The insert for the box is very cozy and thick. The liners for the top of the box and the top of the tree are actually much nicer than what I would have anticipated -- pretty cushy.  The unit comes with Velcro stickers to affix the pads and covers for the bottom box\'s screws so they don\'t mess up the floor.  Both of my cats love the tree (and so do I)!  I would definitely recommend this to friends.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AFG4NMJ7D6DM6KR5CBBXMBMOJ4SA
reviews.review: \n  I am livid. We put this whole thing together then noticed this crack. I’m not taking the whole thing apart to get a new one. I want a replacement part\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AE463HTZNJ4KJZGLEKTVCTBEW3IA
reviews.review: \n  I bought this cat tree because the fabric can be removed and cleaned. I also liked the style. The cat tree is sturdy enough since we only have one cat and she does not jump off of it too much. I only wish it were slightly bigger. She can barely fit on the top shelf.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AGGIGAFTKZ4BGNK32T7JLCBS67RA
reviews.review:
\n This is a great tree. It was super easy to assemble and is quite sturdy. We have 11 cats and they all use it.
I\'ve built a lot of different cat trees and this one was by far the easiest and so well made. I would definitely buy this again.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AG3N5JR6UF3UDX3HBL4AAWOIHTFA
reviews.colour_product: 样式名称: 第 2 代
reviews.review_title: not at all the color shown
reviews.review:
\n I ordered the second generation pattern which showed a rich wooden color -but it was the light color.
It was easy to assemble and I like that you can wash the pads\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AFLSIH37TX7DE65BNDZOJXIF64WQ
reviews.review_title: Top part doesn\'t stay in place and cat falls
reviews.review: \n  Top part doesn\'t stay in place and cat falls quiet often. This thing looks ok but some design seems like not correct like the box is too small.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AHMS7OUXSUUZ25SUOCXX2UJYFTXA
reviews.review:
\n Is nice, but my cat didn\'t used it ones since I bought it!
I think the first reason is because when she tried to jump the structure moved a lot, and that scared my cat.
Came with a little chips in the corners.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AFSOTLRPYYPCZNSC2UPCBJUSRLYA
reviews.review: \n  This cute piece is a great value and much to my surprise my cats got in it instead of the box as soon as it was assembled.  I give it four paws up!\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AFE5CQZORONWD3AV6YMDLAKP74WA
reviews.review_title: Looks nice & works for 12 pound cat
reviews.review: \n  Was worried it be a bit small for my slightly larger (12 pound long hair) cat, but he fits on top & inside the bottom box just fine. He seems to like it. Only wobbles a tiny bit when he jumps on top. Was pretty easy to put together, seems sturdy, and looks nice.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AFYVBTL6IPGNIUCRM2U6Y26ZAWYQ
reviews.review: \n  I ordered this to put in kitchen window. I wanted something with less fabric. This works great, but I just wish it was a bit larger. It was easy to put together.  As my 22 lb and 12 lb cat sleeps on it. It’s easy to keep clean. For this size, the price should of been a little cheaper.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AHVQ7ES3Q5XGCNBTJCWYDBFDRNJA
reviews.review: \n  This is good for really small cats however any cat bigger than 10 pounds will not fit. I\'m pretty disappointed because the images shared are really deceiving. My cat doesn\'t even fit in the bottom compartment :(\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AE2AWILMMLNCO6KLSQYSEL5Q6T7A
reviews.review: \n  My cats are obsessed with this cat tree. I got it so that they could watch me work and stay off of my desk. I was happy to see it’s just about desk height. It’s worked very well. Both of my cats are large (15 pounds or so) as you can see in the photo. They seem to still find it pretty comfortable. They even use the box for napping. Thumbs up.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AG2PXPRAWKEB6JZ4KKSE45JDNPCA
reviews.review: \n  I was surprised that within a week we actually had all levels being used!  Sturdy and clean, especially since you can throw the pads in the wash (they’re attached with Velcro, which is a bonus, lol). Really looks like a piece a furniture.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AGZLSDFL6RFQZABWUBZ3YD7BXPYA
reviews.review: \n  The cat doesn’t like it she never gets on it also it’s a little wobbly at the top but it’s still really pretty rather than the carpet covered eyesores of cat trees\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AG6SLIKUMXIQFF376DT5FOP7AB7A
reviews.review:
\n I was hoping my cat (6months old) would use it. And yes he does use it !! He sleep ever night on the top and use it to do is claws!! We have it since a months or so and he still doesn’t use the “inside bed”.
I’m very satisfied with the purchase. And the dosing is very nice.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AFNZ52LJ4AGOCEFVLEGJW5CBEKUA
reviews.review_title: Not big enough for adult cats
reviews.review: \n  I loved this product when I first got it, but once my kitten was about 7 months old, he had already outgrown it. Beautiful but not practical for adult cats.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AEHOKLI663O6XRMRLWTMI7KIM2ZA
reviews.review_title: easy to build but cat hated it
reviews.review: \n  seemed to be wobbly even though we went over and over making sure everything was tightened. Also the cushion kept sliding and my cat fell and never wanted anything to do with it again\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AED4YQKUPMKOU4H4ZC7JTOA6TY3A
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2020
reviews.people_found_useful_num: One person found this helpful people found this helpful
reviews.review_title: Of course the cats avoid it
reviews.review: \n  Looks great! Cats never use it unless I put treats on it. Easy to put together but the top swivels no matter how hard we tighten it.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AHFSRO4LBY53ZLHNY73QZSGSHSMA
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2020
reviews.review: \n  One of my cats likes to climb up the trim of our windows the watch birds. Thus, I bought this item to try and prevent her climbing. She LOVES this and is constantly sitting on it watching outside. I definitely recommend putting it near a window for cats to watch the outside world. I am considering buying another because can\'t beat the price and I think my other cat needs one too lol.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AEFY4BCOIHQYZF5U2OJYCSSCN2CA
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 22, 2021
reviews.review: \n  Looks like a great product but I received damaged and can’t really assemble. I was going to return it but the only option is to take it to a specific place that is far from me. I’m sure it happened during the delivery but the product wasn’t safely packed to protect it. Too bad 😔\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AFLQIATFUDCS2HPXIG5TKX3JZJLQ
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2020
reviews.review: \n  I really like the look of this cat tree.  No attached carpet on it to get all furry.  It has 3 separate lounging pads that you can remove to wash.  It goes well with my decor too.  Not an obvious cat tree sitting in the room.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AF66EFCJ4LQZSLH2GTUIH7IKLJAA
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2019
reviews.people_found_useful_num: One person found this helpful people found this helpful
reviews.review: \n  It was my bad, I didn’t pay attention to the dimensions and I waited too long to return it for a refund.  So I’m stuck with a step stool for the cats to reach the window. I would recommend this for a kittens first few months.  Not recommend for average size cats.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AGRODUZCAZQMNP2HF6IZWOBSCI2Q
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2019
reviews.people_found_useful_num: 2 people found this helpful people found this helpful
reviews.review: \n  My cats have tipped this over more than once jumping energetically to the top shelf so I am returning it.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AFOXKUHBOZE2YUWOLP4LZ4KNY4JA
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2021
reviews.review:
\n This was on sale when I got it, but it exceeded all expectations regardless of price. The structure is sturdy and the pads are comfortable. Velcro secures them into place. It looks good in our home and doesn\'t take up a ton of room which would make our house look like a crazy cat house.

Perfect for our two kittens.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AE463NZFFB7PHISER7N6L2HXTRGA
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2020
reviews.review: \n  Packaging was adequate, very easy to assemble (Allen keys provided). It’s sturdy and looks nice. The color/shade is a little lighter than pictured, but not so much that I’d consider returning it. Just keep in mind that there may be color/shade variation in the type of laminate that they use at the factory.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AF6FV3GYL73EC7PFTUNML3FNYHWA
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2022
reviews.review: \n  It’s definitely looks a lot bigger in the pictures. It’s very cute though I just wish it was bigger.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AFYALBNLTUSPWYHNHI5V7GO6J4YA
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2021
reviews.review: \n  Nice looking product and seems very sturdy. I would say if you have a larger cat, they may not fit. My cat is 9LB and just fits in the bed.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AHEKPQR2DG7SQ4RNI6UNNNXUTDCQ
reviews.review: \n  Assembly went very smoothly. The moment it was completed my cat marched over and went directly inside the box. It is heavy enough to be sturdy. I\'m not sure how my cats will use the sisel scratching post.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AETXRQGNE5AS22LE6PYD6S4MUPFQ
reviews.review: \n  My cat will sleep in the top forever. It comes up to just about the height of my desk. She uses the very bottom or the very top and doesn\'t scratch on the post.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AHOG4YANKD7UMQHOE2IXFZPI3MWQ
reviews.review: \n  This tree is way overpriced for what it is, and not that well made. However, it does look nice and fits in the small area I bought it for. So I appreciate the size\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AGTH5IBIJSXFMTVUOE67TXNGA37A
reviews.review: \n  My cat is 12 years old and can\'t jump as high as she used to, so I wanted to get her something easy to climb on. This little mini-tree is the perfect height for the window, and she loves it! I was worried she might find the lower box too cramped, but she goes in and sleeps in there all the time. Happy cat!\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AFBDWKHKL3RUNHU25U6DP75WYBDQ
reviews.review: \n  It tries to tip over when a cat runs and jumps up to the top portion. Now my cats are afraid of it.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AHZR637XAH324XOPQVNQLLYYIALQ
reviews.review: \n  Replacement for an older carpet version. I like it because it has cleaner lines and fits in with decor. Cat loves relaxing on top and interior section.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AGKBVINTZ3RKOXDC2CCAXNEKATFA
reviews.review: \n  Zero interest in the cave part, all about the perch by the window. I would say though it is made for smaller cats, she isn\'t large but is known to hang off it a bit.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AEM4CVGUQHJCR4VDEVGGUDMVDTJQ
reviews.review: \n  if you have a large cat it will definitely wobble on them. I suggest putting a weight on the bottom from keeping it from tilting over if your cat is anything over 15lbs and jumps on it.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AFILBZ6DJNWFNO4A2WLMA6RIA3AA
reviews.review_title: On the smaller size but looks so good!
reviews.review: \n  I ordered this for my cat because I wanted a cat tree that looked a little nicer than most. It wasn\'t until after I ordered it that I saw it was described to be for kittens. It is on the smaller size but my adult Siamese can comfortably fit inside and on the top. It looks really nice and it was easy to assemble. As I was putting it together my cat already jumped in!\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AGPF5JK3DUKRZHIAMCFA56PDMU2A
reviews.review: \n  I love this ! It’s super stylish for a cat accessory. My cats really enjoy it as well. My cats are both full grown (11-13lbs) & my male cat is too big to fit in the box in the bottom but still loves playing on it !\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AFWIIKW7B4DYJWDEUH3WZ4JZ4HVA
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2021
reviews.review: \n  My cats are now afraid of it because it was too wobbly when they tried to play on it.  Maybe better for small cats.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AE47RREUSQGTBFADJF3PJ3RXJREA
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2021
reviews.review: \n  This was super easy to assemble. It isn\'t the highest quality materials but it looks nice and clean\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AF3QH6K7SU27S444YCMO6SJFSUZA
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2020
reviews.review: \n  I didn’t expect this to be such high quality because of the price. Most of these cat trees are just carpeted and cost more. I wanted something that would look nice out in my living room and this one is great. I didn’t read the description well though and it was a little smaller than expected. I have a kitten and a 23 pound fat cat. This tree is great for smaller cats!!! But fat*ss can’t fit 😂\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AG7HJ2KU7ZQ2MXJSCCZQWY6CEZXQ
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2020
reviews.review: \n  My cats liked this cat tree a lot! We used it as their constant structure when we were moving apartments and they had to spend some time in hotels. They still love it even after we\'ve settled into our new place. We placed the velcro that keeps the bed in place in a weird way but they are pretty strong once they\'re on there so make sure you know where you want it.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AG7LS27XDYPV7BVFF7A4O4AQZD6A
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2020
reviews.review: \n  She loves the perch. Probably spends a quarter to half her day in it. She uses the scratcher when she remembers it\'s there (I have others), it\'s rare that she uses the condo but the perch is at the window, so why would she?\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AHTRLPHSI5L6FKYQKDKVDECTSK3A
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2020
reviews.review: \n  Modern style cat tree. Our cat is 11 pounds and she fits comfortably in the box, on the box or on the bed on top. Pretty simple to put together.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AEBJN3BAUNEIDZUFFB2L2QMLVLGQ
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2019
reviews.review: \n  This works perfectly for our new kitten!  We put it in front of a bedroom window and he loves it!  I did have to add some extra tape to keep the padding on top, and it is not all that big. A large cat would not fit.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AGK4PK7N5OR5YY36LX5Y2JZHPY5A
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2020
reviews.review: \n  Looks great! I got this for our newly adopted kittens. They’re so young, not roaming the house yet, & not using this yet, but it was easy to assemble & it feels sturdy.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AFAAZGTEUDY7DSKWVGEKULNCH4VQ
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2021
reviews.review: \n  I have a small cat and her first time using it, she toppled it over so now she wants nothing to do with it. Sending it back.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AF35FMBZB6GXOTP4LS4ZZZUH5SWQ
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2021
reviews.review: \n  Very sturdy and out cats love it! They were very excited to use it as soon as we finished building it. It was very simple to assemble as well.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AHXQX7NUCA2EGJLANW6Q7T6WDFSQ
reviews.review: \n  This looks very nice, however I have a large cat so, he doesn\'t really fit in it!! He does like looking out of the window from the top.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AH3GFENUMTUNA7IKXWGEGD2DNOAQ
reviews.review: \n  Wood construction so it can sit outside on my screened in porch without getting nappy and wet with the humidity. 14#kitty is almost too big for it, but he loves it. I find him in or on it all the time.\n

reviews.author: amzn1.account.AG6SEUXTRYI3ENZN5X35KX3F7PZQ
